system.requirements:
Tier 1: Inquisitor E.Adv, Willpower 40
Aptitudes: Fellowship, Leadership
system.effect:
Inquisitor can spend two Fate Points as a Free Action to grant another character within 10 metres a Fate Point. Any other character within 10 metres can spend two Fate Points to grant this character a Fate Point.
In either case, number of Fate Points can't exceed Fate Point maximum.
